Topic.Title: Performance

Message.Msg: XOM has a self-centered lightweight as CEO. Rex Tillerson and his Board should respect XOM's cash-hungry shareholders, rather than do massive stock buybacks that simply inflate the EPS deceptively to make Tillerson look good, despite the flat earnings and failure of his XTO purchase. We need a 30% dividend increase on April 25, and discontinuation of buybacks -- or throw Tillerson out.

Topic.Title: The land of the living & oil…

Message.Msg: No - Europe understands the use of government to control people and modify their behavior through cultural training. This is difficult for countries such as the USA which really have no culture except for consumerism and its more obscene and manifestation - libertarian free market ideology. The immigrants of your past were culturally modified but then they were copying the Kaiser's Germany back then.

Message.Title: Where the machine of European government really came from....
Message.Msg: Holland... It was not German it was Dutch. Frederick William was educated at the University of Leiden and the Stadtholder's court during the Dutch wars with Spain and was well versed in the use of government to control people when he arrived back in Berlin. One could not have had better teaches in cultural imperialism than his teacher of the time. What came after was just a systematic extension of the methods. There was not such thing as "German" at the time, except a vague commonality of language - German was created by government. The Dutch instructed the English in the use of government too after 1688, and the Britons learned to be British, cultural imperialists... You can thank the Dutch for what order remains in the USA.

Topic.Title: The land of the living & oil…

Message.Msg: I forgot nothing, and usually forget nothing... I mentioned you prolifically multiplying slums that produce your criminals. Ex-out those, as they are of no use to your country, and you are just like Europe, only worse because the aliens can vote and fill your prisons. Worse still you have no party that believes in government except to pass out welfare, so you will not fix your problem. Your slum dwellers do not produce enough to purchase new cars either. They feed off the used one purchased new by what remains of your cultured, disciplined European population. No skills = no job = no means to buy new car… You have a bleak future ahead...I hope you enjoy it.

Topic.Title: Where the machine of European government really came from....

Message.Msg: That’s what Imperialism means. It may interest you to know that the Prussian Imperial palaces are being rebuilt Germany. In Potsdam, the Potsdamer Stadtschloss is nearing completion. In Berlin, the Berliner Stadtschloss will be rebuilt in a few years. The Communist parliament building, built on the site of the old palace, has been totally cleared away to make room for it. Germany’s schoolchildren will be able to look upon the edifices of their grandfathers just exactly as they once were. The Unter den Linden has been restored to its former self. We take care to educate our children in Germany. 14:1 students for every teacher too, and what teachers!

Message.Title: STOP THE KEYSTONE PIPELINE
Message.Msg: It's a darn shame that oil companies like BP and Exxon think they can pollute the environment with impunity. It's obvious from the latest Exxon oil spill in Arkansas that the Keystone pipeline should not be built and we should not put at risk our environmental safety just so an oil company can transport a toxic product to Texas refineries, where the finished product won't even be used in the U. S. but exported. The Keystone pipeline will do absolutely nothing to lower U. S. gasoline prices as oil comapnies and oil trader/speculators have engaged in deliberate conspiracies to keep gas prices at unjustfiably high levels!!!!!
